Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT value(sum(val_operacao)0)
FROM seguros.v0sinistro_auto1
 
WHERE T1.NUM_APOLICE        =  :NUM_APOLICE
  AND T1.NUM_ITEM           =  :NUM_ITEM
  AND T3.NUM_APOLICE        =  T1.NUM_APOLICE
  AND T3.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO  =  T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
  AND T3.RAMO               =  :RAMO
  AND T3.SITUACAO          <>  '2'
  AND T3.CODCAU             =   1
  AND T4.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO  =  T3.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
  AND T4.SITUACAO          <>  '2'
  AND T4.OPERACAO          IN (1181,1182,1183,1184)
/
 END SQL
